com.logiccity.minecraft.api

Interface ModCommandInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBuildCommand, AntiAFK, AntiKB, ArmorStatus, Attack, AutoMine, AutoSprint, AutoStaircase, BaseFinder, BowAim, BowEscape, BuildBooleanArray, BuildFloor, BuildLetters, BuildMaze, BuildPlay, BuildPole, BuildWall, ChestESP, Criticals, CustomModCommandBase, FastMaze, Flight, Freecam, Fullbright, GoBack, GoForward, GoLeft, GoRight, GoToCmd, KillAura, NoFall, NoWeb, ProphuntEsp, Small, SmallPrymaid, SmallTriangle, Sneak, SolveMaze, TallWall, TallWallDiagonal, TallWallSide, Tracer, Turn, Xray

    public interface ModCommandInterface
    The interface for commands that requires continuously running asynchronous operations in update or render tic threads until certain conditions are met

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addToSyncCmds(java.lang.String cmdName, java.lang.String args)
      Add a command to a list of commands that will be synchronously executed before next update invocation
      void cleanupCmd()
      Cleanup the command
      boolean doInCmdInputThread(java.lang.String input)
      Configure this command based on user input from on the chat line.
      boolean doInPostInGameRenderTicThread()
      Perform additional rendering on top of the main rendering.
      boolean doInRenderTicThread()
      Perform main UI rendering in the game tick thread which runs every few milliseconds
      boolean doInUpdateTicThread()
      Invoke operations in the game tick thread which runs every few milliseconds
      void initCmd(java.lang.String[] args)
      Initialize the command

    • Method Detail

      • initCmd

        void initCmd(java.lang.String[] args)
        Initialize the command
        Parameters:
        args - command arguments

      • cleanupCmd

        void cleanupCmd()
        Cleanup the command

      • addToSyncCmds

        void addToSyncCmds(java.lang.String cmdName,
                   java.lang.String args)
        Add a command to a list of commands that will be synchronously executed before next update invocation
        Parameters:
        cmdName - the name of the command
        args - comma or space separated list of arguments

      • doInUpdateTicThread

        boolean doInUpdateTicThread()
        Invoke operations in the game tick thread which runs every few milliseconds
        Returns:
        true will cause the command to be stopped, false will cause the command to continue

      • doInRenderTicThread

        boolean doInRenderTicThread()
        Perform main UI rendering in the game tick thread which runs every few milliseconds
        Returns:
        true will cause the command to be stopped, false will cause the command to continue

      • doInPostInGameRenderTicThread

        boolean doInPostInGameRenderTicThread()
        Perform additional rendering on top of the main rendering. Overwrite content below.
        Returns:
        true will cause the command to be stopped, false will cause the command to continue

      • doInCmdInputThread

        boolean doInCmdInputThread(java.lang.String input)
        Configure this command based on user input from on the chat line. All command configuration chat inputs start with "/-"
        Parameters:
        input - the string after "/-"
        Returns:
        true will cause the command to be stopped, false will cause the command to continue
